Package org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration

Class EventTitleHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.AbstractEventElementHandler
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.configuration.EventTitleHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsEventProvider, AddHandlerEventHandler, EventHandler, RemoveHandlerEventHandler
    final class EventTitleHandler
extends AbstractEventElementHandler
    It manages click, enter and leave events on title instances.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
